entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Light snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 27 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
